issue.message: This androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout should use `android:layout_height="wrap_content"`
The result of `subscribe` is not used
Field requires API level 24 (current min is 23): `android.provider.Settings#ACTION_VPN_SETTINGS`
Attribute `networkSecurityConfig` is only used in API level 24 and higher (current min is 23)
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
Specify a valid range of job id's for `WorkManager` to use.
Limit vector icons sizes to 200×200 to keep icon drawing fast; see https://developer.android.com/studio/write/vector-asset-studio#when for more
Suspicious equality check: `equals()` is not implemented in BookmarkFoldersItemTypes
Suspicious equality check: `equals()` is not implemented in BookmarksItemTypes
Suspicious equality check: `equals()` is not implemented in FavoriteItemTypes
Must use `app:tint` instead of `android:tint`
Use `app:drawableEndCompat` instead of `android:drawableEnd`
Use `app:drawableEndCompat` instead of `android:drawableEnd`
Use `app:drawableEndCompat` instead of `android:drawableEnd`
Use `app:drawableEndCompat` instead of `android:drawableEnd`

Use `app:drawableStartCompat` instead of `android:drawableStart`

The quantity `'one'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (0, 1), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.
issue.errorLine1:
%1$d autre essayaient de vous traquer ici.

Je les ai bloqués !

☝️Vous pouvez voir dans la barre d\'adresse qui essaie de vous traquer lorsque vous visitez un nouveau site.️]]>

issue.message: The quantity `'one'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (0, 1), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.
issue.errorLine1:
mais %1$d estavam a tentar rastreá-lo aqui.

Eu bloqueei-os!

☝️Pode verificar a barra de endereços para ver quem está a tentar rastreá-lo quando visita um novo site.]]>

☝️Vous pouvez voir dans la barre d\'adresse URL qui essaie de vous traquer lorsque vous visitez un nouveau site.️️]]>

issue.message: The quantity `'zero'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (0, 10~20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 100, 1000, 10000, 100000, 1000000, …), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.
issue.errorLine1:
%1$d citas vietnes mēģināja tevi šeit izsekot.

Es tās nobloķēju!

☝️ Vari pārbaudīt adreses joslu, lai redzētu, kas tevi mēģina izsekot, kad tu apmeklē jaunu vietni.️]]>

issue.message: The quantity `'one'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (1, 101, 201, 301, 401, 501, 601, 701, 1001, …), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.
issue.errorLine1:
%1$d drugi so vas skušali zaslediti tukaj.

Blokiral sem jih!

☝️Preverite lahko naslovno vrstico, da vidite, kdo vas poskuša zaslediti, ko obiščete novo spletišče.️]]>

issue.message: The quantity `'one'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (1, 21, 31, 41, 51, 61, 71, 81, 101, 1001, …), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.
issue.errorLine1:
%1$d drugi te pokušalo ovdje pratiti.

Ja sam ih blokirao!

☝️Možeš pogledati adresnu traku da vidiš tko te pokušava pratiti kada posjetiš novo web-mjesto.]]>

issue.message: The quantity `'one'` matches more than one specific number in this locale (1, 21, 31, 41, 51, 61, 71, 81, 101, 1001, …), but the message did not include a formatting argument (such as `%d`). This is usually an internationalization error. See full issue explanation for more.
issue.errorLine1:
%1$d kitas bandė tave stebėti.

Užblokavau juos!

☝️Patikrink URL juostą ir pamatyk, kas bando tave stebėti, kai lankaisi naujoje svetainėje.️]]>

issue.message: Formatting %d followed by words ("bookmarks"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Formatting %d followed by words ("unencrypted"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
issue.errorLine1: <string name="privacyProtectionNotificationUpgadeDescription">You protected your data by securing %d unencrypted connections while using DuckDuckGo.</string>

issue.message: Formatting %d followed by words ("trackers"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
issue.errorLine1: <string name="privacyProtectionNotificationTrackerDescription">You protected your data by blocking %d trackers while using DuckDuckGo.</string>

issue.message: Formatting %d followed by words ("trackers"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
issue.errorLine1: <string name="privacyProtectionNotificationBothDescription">You protected your data by blocking %d trackers and securing %d unencrypted connections while using DuckDuckGo.</string>
